text: welcome to daily video vocabulary a dose
of daily new English phrases and words
brought to you by let's store
podcast.com
hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 104 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
burst ones bubble let's find out what it
means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation to burst ones bubble
when you are very enthusiastic about
something in your life and all of a
sudden you realize it was unreal you
land up feeling very low to burst
someone's bubble is an idiom that
basically means to ruin someone's happy
moment by making them realize what is
actually happening in reality is nothing
close to how they feel about the same it
also means to shatter an illusion about
something or to destroy someone's
fantasy if you correct someone's belief
or you make someone suddenly understand
the unpleasant truth of a situation you
burst their bubble for example you and
your friends are very excited to party
on New Year's Eve but due to a riot
break out in your city the party is
canceled on realizing this your
excitement dies down it means that the
cancellation has burst your bubble okay
now that you know what this idiom means
let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation
example one Little John was excited to
leave for the picnic at the beach but
the heavy rainfall burst his bubble
example til the manager burst John's
bubble when he told him that he was not
going to get an appraisal this year
example 3 the news of their stillborn
baby burst the couple's bubble as they
couldn't wait to welcome their first
child example for Williams bubble was
burst when he got to know his girlfriend
had cheated on him example 5
Peter was rejected in many interviews
but this didn't burst his bubble of
joining one of the best IT companies
even though he was a fresher example 6
when Michele found out about the
surprise birthday party that was to be
thrown by her friend Mary it burst her
bubble as it no longer remained a
surprise
example seven though the famous actress
was in a hurry to leave the venue she
didn't burst her fans bubble and obliged
by giving them her autograph
example 8 all his team players depending
on mark for winning the final match but
his son will help burst his team players
bubble as he couldn't play the final
match
example 9 Charles was upset when his
father told him I don't mean to burst
your bubble but don't waste your time
dreaming about a business venture that
isn't going to work example 10 Vivian
burst his girlfriend's bubble when he
told her that the dress she fancied the
most didn't suit her at all that's the
end of today's episode
has anyone ever burst your bubble how
did you feel and react kindly share your
experiences in the comment box below
this video thank you for watching us do
watch all the episodes of daily video
vocabulary to better your English
language skills do subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the
latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or a phrase
till then bye and take care
